text: The men's decathlon event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 12 and 13 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| André Niklaus ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jaakko Ojaniemi ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| William Frullani ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 12-13 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
